artist: Engraver: Abbé Jean Claude Richard de Saint-Non; Artist: After Hubert Robert
description: individual representations of five antiquities: woman raising her dress (Palazzo Guistinani); female figure wearing a nemes, enthroned with hands on lions (after Robert); standing figure wearing nemes with snake coiled around body (Palazzo Barberini); draped winged figure (stucco, Vatican); altar decorated with a procession of draped women (Villa Albani)
inscription:
Signature, Date, and Inscription

in image in black: Saint Non sc 1763 | details of each image in plate
portfolio: From Vershciyde Gesichten in 't Haechsche Bos na 't Leven geteyckent; plate 4
title: Print
